register.heading: Register Account
register.usernameDescription: This is your public display name.
register.successAlertDescription: Please check your email for verification
register.errorMessage: An error occurred while creating your account

verify.heading: Verify your email
verify.errorMessage: An error occurred while verifying your email

login.heading: Login to your account
login.description: Enter your email and password to login
login.loginDescription: Enter your email and password to login
login.forgotPasswordDescription: Click here to reset your password
login.errorMessage: An error occurred while logging in
login.pinDescription: Enter the 6 digit code sent to your email
login.pinErrorMessage: An error occurred while verifying your email

resetPassword.heading: Reset your password
resetPassword.description: Enter your email to reset your password
resetPassword.emailDescription: Enter your email to reset your password
resetPassword.successAlertDescription: Please check your email for the new password
resetPassword.errorMessage: An error occurred while resetting your password

newPassword.heading: Create new password
newPassword.errorMessage: An error occurred while resetting your password

deactivate.heading: Deactivate Account
deactivate.description: Enter your email and password to deactivate your account
deactivate.pinDescription: Enter the 6 digit code sent to your email
deactivate.emailDescription: Enter your email to deactivate your account
deactivate.errorMessage: An error occurred while deactivating your account

header.heading: Settings
header.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

header.heading: Profile
header.description: Set your profile avatar and username. You can also change your password here.

avatar.heading: Profile Avatar

confirmModal.heading: Delete Avatar
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to delete your avatar?

avatar.info: Supported formats: JPG, PNG, GIF, WEBP, AVIF, SVG. Max size: 10MB.
avatar.errorUpdateMessage: An error occurred while updating your avatar
avatar.errorRemoveMessage: An error occurred while removing your avatar

info.heading: Profile Info
info.usernameDescription: This is your public display name.
info.errorUpdateMessage: An error occurred while updating your profile info

createForm.heading: Create Social Link
createForm.titleDescription: This is the title of the social link.
createForm.urlDescription: This is the URL of the social link.
createForm.errorUpdateMessage: An error occurred while creating the social link

editForm.errorUpdateMessage: An error occurred while updating the social link
editForm.errorDeleteMessage: An error occurred while deleting the social link

socialLinks.errorReorderMessage: An error occurred while reordering the social links

header.heading: Account
header.description: Manage your account settings and preferences

email.heading: Email
email.emailDescription: This is your email address. Enter your new email address to update your account.
email.errorUpdateMessage: An error occurred while updating your email

password.heading: Password
password.errorUpdateMessage: An error occurred while updating your password

enable.heading: Enable Two-Factor Authentication
enable.qrInstruction: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app
enable.errorMessage: An error occurred while enabling two-factor authentication
enable.codeDescription: This is the code to enable two-factor authentication.

disable.heading: Disable Two-Factor Authentication
disable.message: After disabling two-factor authentication, you will not be able to login with your email and password. You will need to login with your email and the code sent to your email.
disable.errorMessage: An error occurred while disabling two-factor authentication

confirmModal.heading: Deactivate Account
confirmModal.message: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account? You will not be able to login with your email and password. You will need to login with your email and the code sent to your email.
confirmModal.errorMessage: An error occurred while deactivating your account

theme.heading: Theme
theme.errorMessage: An error occurred while updating the theme

language.heading: Language
language.errorMessage: An error occurred while updating the language

notifications.errorMessage: An error occurred while updating the notifications settings
